definitions: the process of developing or presenting a theory, policy, or system in further detail

examples.text: his work led to the elaboration of a theory of evolution
the concept needs more elaboration than a short essay allows

shortDefinitions: develop or present theory, policy, or system in further detail

definitions: the addition of more detail concerning what has already been said

examples.text: the speech lacked any elaboration on concrete measures taken
this is a point requiring elaboration

shortDefinitions: addition of more detail concerning what has already been said
